ComicInfo.Summary: In the future, humankind works for the coldly sentient robot community creating Emopills for their pleasure. Trippy servant Nomobots Jimmy and his steadfast buddy rescue Emopill scientist Nadia and a stash of the drugs from a deadly punitive police force and go on the lamb - when they're soon beset by a gang of nasty Nazibots... and that's just the beginning of their troubles. Out of the pan, into the fire!
